submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        slist = SortedList()
        dic = dict()
        curr = n-1
        ans = []
        for a, b in queries:
            idx = slist.bisect_right(a)
            if idx < len(slist) and dic[slist[idx]] <= a and slist[idx] >= b:
                ans.append(curr)
                continue

            while True :
                idx = slist.bisect_right(a)
                if idx < len(slist) and slist[idx] <= b:
                    curr += slist[idx] - dic[slist[idx]] - 1
                    del dic[slist[idx]]
                    slist.remove(slist[idx]) 
                    continue
                slist.add(b)
                dic[b] = a
                curr -= b - a -1
                break
            ans.append(curr)
        return ans
